article_title: Maximum hours for student-employees cut to 20 per week
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: , student employment, affordable care act, time clocks, employment, insurance, 20 hours, 25 hours
article_metadata.author: Paige Brockway

og.description: Beginning next fall, Oakland University’s on-campus student employees will be able to work a maximum of 20 hours per week, a five-hour cutback from the current 25-hour limit.
